Privacy: quando il Web fa lo spione

03 February, 2014

Part of a series of analysis aggregating transparency reports from multiple tech companies. (In Italian)

The main articled was feature in the February paper issue of Wired Italy, as well as in a series of online interactives like this one.

Developed together with Davide Mancino.
